message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $90. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $88. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
